actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the maximum educational benefits for chapter 35 trainees to 48 months and to allow additional educational benefits for certain wives and widows.

summary.text: Extends the maximum educational benefits for qualified veterans to 48 months (presently limited to 36 months). Permits additional educational benefits for wives and widows of such veterans.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the maximum educational benefits for chapter 35 trainees to 48 months and to allow additional educational benefits for certain wives and widows.
